verbs.description: [sweet n savory] apple stuffing [ARGM-TMP: after a few dozen thanksgivings] [ARG0: i] [V: began] [ARG1: to search for a new stuffing recipe with its bits of fruit and nuts this one has become my favorite —karen horne staab of new rochelle new york]
